name: Letterpress Sea Creatures Perpetual Calendar
description:
My grandsons love the sea and what better way to celebrate the creatures that call it home, but with a perpetual calendar! Learn to identify 27 creatures and what they eat (see the animals in their bellies). From a humpback whale to an oyster, these creatures will remind you what day it is.

•  creatures letterpress printed from original illustration
•  2 colors, gray and curry yellow on 110# cotton paper
•  months, days, and dates are letterpress printed in a dusty gray ink on 100# recycled white paper
• months, days, and dates are each a separate piece that move around to the appropriate selection. Ready to read every month, day, & date combination. It will never go out of date.
• size  8.5" x 8.5" and comes with a ribbon for hanging
• made in the USA
• designed by Blackbirdletterpress

• the back shows a creature identification chart and list of animals. 
  learn. identify. explore.

name: Men's Letterpress Notecards : Set of 50
description:
Clean and classic.

Send your notes out in style with this simple and elegant letterpress stationery set. Type is hand set in your choice of font (see last image for font selection) with name of your choice on the lower right hand corner. *Set pictured is set in Cheltenham.

Makes a perfect gift for anyone, even as a treat for yourself! ;)

*************************************** 
+ A2 (4.25" x 5.5") 
+ Printed on 110lb Lettra 100% cotton paper 
+ Set of 50 cards 
+ Your choice of color from our selection (see last image) 
+ Your choice of typeface from our selection (see last image) 
+ Your choice of White, Pearl or Kraft envelopes 
(If no choice is made, set will be sent with white square flap cotton envelopes)

*************************************** 
To order:

1. Please include name in notes to seller (must fit in one line). 
2. Select typeface. 
3. Select ink color. 
4. Select envelope color - please note we don't stock all the colors but are happy to order them. If you'd like to know which colors we have in stock please contact us. Ordering only adds a day or two to your order.

name: Bike Holiday
description:
True Story:  This Bicycle is special because the design is based on a real bike that Blackbirdlletterpress took a photograph of after their friend Craig made it.  Tis the season to ride around on a bike pulling a Christmas tree lit up with lights! At the local Festival of Lights downtown every year, he rides around with a tree that's all lit up for the holiday.


• single holiday bike card (postcard style, not folded) with rounded corners 
• #10 side flap kraft envelope. 
•  size:  9 1/8" x 3 7/8"

name: Feel Better
